page.title: 11School Dinners
page.content: At twelve O'Clock we go out to play. At about ten past twelve the dinner lady blows a whistle and shouts "Dinner eaters" which means children who have hot dinners.So I go in and wash my hands.After we have washed and dried our hands we line up.Then the dinner lady counts us to make sure we are all there.We walk into the canteen ,where I sit down next to James Sharp. The most popular meal is fish in batter,with chips and peas.The favourite sweet is cheese and biscuits .My favourite meal is roast pork, cabbage,roast potatoes and gravy. My favourite sweet is chocolate sponge with custard on top.When we have finished we ask the dinner lady if we can go out to play.
